DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Evaluation Other Type of Remedial Action Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A specification of the type of remedial action that was taken._The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.
